results.title: As Xi Befriends World Leaders, He Hardens His Stance on the U.S.
results.abstract: China has rebuffed calls to restart high-level talks with the United States, raising the risk of confrontation in contested areas like the Taiwan Strait.

multimedia.caption: President Xi Jinping of China with President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva of Brazil last week in Beijing.
President Xi Jinping of China with President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva of Brazil last week in Beijing.
President Xi Jinping of China with President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva of Brazil last week in Beijing.

results.title: Israel’s Right-Wing Government Has Jewish Democrats at a Loss
results.abstract: American lawmakers defending Israel have often fallen back on what they call the countries’ shared democratic values. But defending the current far-right government is proving a lot harder.

multimedia.caption: Israelis protesting against Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s plan to overhaul the country’s judiciary, which has also divided American Jews.
multimedia.copyright: Avishag Shaar-Yashuv for The New York Times

results.title: DeSantis’s Electability Pitch Wobbles, Despite G.O.P. Losses Under Trump
results.abstract: The former president’s rivals are seeking to tap into Republican frustration with recent election disappointments to urge a new face for the party in 2024, but it is proving to be a tough sell.

multimedia.caption: Ron DeSantis has cast himself as more electable than Donald J. Trump, but for years Republican primary voters have cast ballots with their hearts, opting for hard-liners who lose in general elections.
multimedia.copyright: Scott Eisen/Getty Images; Christopher Lee for The New York Times

results.title: Hundreds of Miles Apart, Separate Shootings Follow Wrong Turns
results.abstract: Two men appeared in courtrooms in different parts of the country on Wednesday, charged in shootings that came after minor missteps on everyday tasks.
results.byline: By Julie Bosman, Mitch Smith, Jesse McKinley and Jay Root

multimedia.caption: Andrew D. Lester, charged in the shooting of Ralph Yarl, pleaded not guilty on Wednesday.
Andrew D. Lester, charged in the shooting of Ralph Yarl, pleaded not guilty on Wednesday.
